text: Stefano Ferrari (born January 1, 1921) is a retired Italian professional football player. He was born in Milan. He played for 2 seasons (47 games, 13 goals) in the Serie A for A.S. Roma. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Brescia Calcio players Category:A.S. Roma players Category:U.S.D. 1913 Seregno Calcio players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Stefano Ferrari
